resources:
RCController
Please click BACK again to exit 0 km/h
Long-click to interact Cruise Control activated.\nUse throttle to deactivate it
Long-click to turn lights on Single click to lower the light beam
Single click to lower assistance Long-click to increase assistance
Single click to lower maximum vehicle\'s speed Long-click to increase maximum vehicle\'s speed
Single click to move to a more locked diff Long-click to move to a more open diff
Not possible option due to \"Handling Assistance\" settings
Server IP and Port Set IP and port OK Cancel Server IP Server PortPlease click BACK again to exit
